name: Safe Zone No.1 (Digital Editon)
description: This artwork is from a series called Morphine, which was later renamed the Safe Zone. The Safe Zone is driven out from the dark era of the artistâ€™s life when he was struggling with the addiction problem. A passive period that isolated the artist in his safe corner, a period that was just a consumption, without any action.  This lived experience was an inspiration for the artist to extend his encounter toward the world, to a large part of contemporary societies. Societies that do not act, have no action and only consume in their safe zone, in corners of their home.
